data.name: Horus Heresy: Legions - Titandeath bundle
data.detailed_description:
“It does not matter if we are defeated today”
- Princeps of Sabris Regnum.

Be among the first to mind-link with a Titan with a fully playable deck from the new Loyalist Legios faction! Bear the colours of Legio Praesagius on the battlefield with the Titandeath Bundle, which includes:

  • A 30-card deck featuring the Sabris Regnum Warlord-Class Titan as its Warlord and many cards from the Loyalist Legios faction.
  • An exclusive card back bearing the banner of Legio Praesagius.
  • 500 coins to spend on card crates and grow your collection.

Become a Princeps, start your Loyalist Legios card collection and march into battle bearing the banner of Legio Praesagius before anyone else! Awaken the Machine-Spirit of the Sabris Regnum, and make the ground tremble!

data.short_description: The Titans have awakened! Become a Princeps with the Titandeath Bundle, including a fully playable deck with cards from the Loyalist Legios faction led by a Warlord Titan, plus an exclusive card back and 500 coins.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Russian, Czech, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
